text.section: The Mayor and Council of Ocean City shall administer and operate the Ocean City Convention Hall.

The Mayor and Council of Ocean City shall:
Keep records as are consistent with sound business practice;
Cause an audit to be made of its accounting at the conclusion of each calendar or fiscal year; and
Submit a detailed annual report of the activities and financial standing of the Convention Hall to the Board of Public Works.
The Convention Hall is exempt from taxation by the State and local governments.

As a condition for the administration and management of the Convention Hall, the Mayor and Council of Ocean City shall enter into a contract with the State of Maryland accepting title to the Convention Hall as of July 1, 1985.
